title: Announcement, Vicki Arndt Peter Lenzo From Artists Studios/ CurrentWork, 1990
title_raw: Vicki Arndt Peter Lenzo From Artists Studios/ CurrentWork
signed: Signature imprinted in maroon, from center to right edge, verso: for and by Design: EDWARD FELLA: August and Forth, Hits AND the MISSES, 1990
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in maroon ink, diagonally across upper left quadrant: Vickie Arndt; diagonally across upper right quadrant: Peter Lenzo; upper half, center: Detroit Focus Gallery/ 743 Beaubien, Third Floor/ Detroit, Michigan4 8226/ Hours:  Noon to 6pm Wed.-Sat./ (313) 962-9025; across center: From Artists Studios/* CurrentWork/ Cu rators: Joe Zajac, Shirley Parish/ July 13th -- August 3rd, 1990/ Opening Reception: Friday, 5:30 --8:30pm/ (Arts Fou nda t ion of Michigan Award s/ Present at ion, 7:30)

Verso: Lower left quadrant: Detroit Focus Gallery/ 743 BEAUBIEN, Third Floor/ Across from the Bricktown People mover station/ With support from/ The Naional Endowment for the Arts/ Michigan Council for the Arts/ and Detroit Council of the Arts/ Arts Foundation of Michigan/ Equal Opportinity Org./ Member of N.a.a.o.;  lower right quadrant: Non-profit Organization/ BULK RATE/ U. S. Postage/ PAID/ Detroit, Michigan/ PERMIT/ NO 2 9 6 0 

* The "/" is included in the text.
description:
Poster announcement for exhibition at Detroit Focus Gallery, designed to be mailed.  Printed in maroon ink.  
Recto: [Printed] handwritten text in a variety of sizes, giving names of participating artists, locations, curator, dates, and additional information.   Text forms a triangle over a square, resembling a house.  
Verso: Upper edge, center, image of a log.  Across lower sheet, sponsors and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Vicki Arndt Peter Lenzo From Artists Studios/ CurrentWork, 1990. Offset lithograph on off-white paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-46
